titleStmt.title: A proclamation, discharging the exportation of victual.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Scotland. Sovereign (1689-1694 : William and Mary)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, Printer to the King and Queens excellent Majesties,

notesStmt.note: Dated: Given under Our Signet at Holy-rude-house, the twenty one day of June, one thousand six hundred and ninety years, and of Our Reign the second year.
Signed: Gilb. Eliot Cls. Sti. Concilii.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
